name: Agent Lightning
description:
Your planet is being threatened by a wave of asteroids. You are the only one between life and extinction. Are you ready for the challenge?

Compete against other agents and leave your record on the leaderboards.

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Movement
Space - Jump
S - Dash
D - Fire

How to play:

Fire + Arrow Keys to control your lightning direction and destroy the asteroids.
Dash + Arrow Keys to move faster and regain your power.
